languages.text: "Улучшенный воин зовется развалиной, потому что гемункул вторгается в его природу, как завоеватель, разрушает обыденность и творит совершенство на ее развалинах. А акофист — почтеннейший из развалин, самый сильный и страшный".

"An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."
languages.original_text: "Улучшенный воин зовется развалиной, потому что гемункул вторгается в его природу, как завоеватель, разрушает обыденность и творит совершенство на ее развалинах. А акофист — почтеннейший из развалин, самый сильный и страшный".

traits.locale_text: "An augmented warrior is called a wrack because the haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity and creates perfection from what is left. An acothyst is the superior among the wracks, the strongest and the most frightening."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「強化された戦士はラックと呼ばれる。ハモンキュラスが征服者のようにその本質に侵入し、平凡さを奪い、残されたものから完璧さを生み出すからだ。アコシストはラックの中でも優れた存在であり、最も強く、最も恐ろしい存在だ」
languages.original_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."

traits.locale_text: 「強化された戦士はラックと呼ばれる。ハモンキュラスが征服者のようにその本質に侵入し、平凡さを奪い、残されたものから完璧さを生み出すからだ。アコシストはラックの中でも優れた存在であり、最も強く、最も恐ろしい存在だ」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “血伶人会从各种各样的肢体中创造出完美的战士，这种浑身上下装满了植入物的战士被称为‘凌虐者’。而在所有凌虐者之中，凌虐之首是最优秀的战士，拥有最强壮的身体与最可怕的力量。”
languages.original_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."

traits.locale_text: “血伶人会从各种各样的肢体中创造出完美的战士，这种浑身上下装满了植入物的战士被称为‘凌虐者’。而在所有凌虐者之中，凌虐之首是最优秀的战士，拥有最强壮的身体与最可怕的力量。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Se llama atormentados a los guerreros aumentados porque el Hemónculo invade su esencia como un conquistador: arrasa con lo mundano y crea la perfección de sus restos. Los acotistas son los atormentados de máxima categoría, los más fuertes y aterradores».
languages.original_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."

traits.locale_text: «Se llama atormentados a los guerreros aumentados porque el Hemónculo invade su esencia como un conquistador: arrasa con lo mundano y crea la perfección de sus restos. Los acotistas son los atormentados de máxima categoría, los más fuertes y aterradores».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ein augmentierter Krieger wird Folterer genannt, aber auch er wurde gefoltert. Der Haemonculus dringt in seine Natur ein wie ein Eroberer, zerstört das Mondäne und erschafft aus dem, was übrig ist, Perfektion. Ein Akothyst ist der oberste unter den Folterern sowie der stärkste und furchterregendste."
languages.original_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."

traits.locale_text: "Ein augmentierter Krieger wird Folterer genannt, aber auch er wurde gefoltert. Der Haemonculus dringt in seine Natur ein wie ein Eroberer, zerstört das Mondäne und erschafft aus dem, was übrig ist, Perfektion. Ein Akothyst ist der oberste unter den Folterern sowie der stärkste und furchterregendste."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Les gorgones sont des guerriers augmentés ; leur nature même a été envahie par l'hémoncule qui annihile l'ordinaire pour ne laisser que la perfection. L'acothyste est le plus fort et le plus effrayant d'entre eux. »
languages.original_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."

traits.locale_text: « Les gorgones sont des guerriers augmentés ; leur nature même a été envahie par l'hémoncule qui annihile l'ordinaire pour ne laisser que la perfection. L'acothyste est le plus fort et le plus effrayant d'entre eux. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ogmentli savaşçılara Harap denir. Zira Haimonkulus, onun tabiatını bir fatih misali işgal eder, dünyeviliğini harap eder ve geriye kalanlardan mükemmel bir şey ortaya çıkarır. Havarist ise Harapların en üstünü olmasının yanı sıra hem en güçlü hem de en korkuncudur."
languages.original_text: "An augmented warrior is called a Wrack because the Haemonculus invades his nature like a conqueror, wrecks the mundanity, and creates perfection from whatever is left. An Acothyst is the superior among the Wracks as well as the strongest and the most frightening."

traits.locale_text: "Ogmentli bir savaşçıya Harap denir. Çünkü Haimonkulus, onun tabiatını bir fatih misali işgal eder, dünyeviliğini harap eder ve geriye kalanlardan mükemmellik yaratır. Havarist ise Harapların en üstünü olmasının yanı sıra hem en güçlü hem de en korkuncudur."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
